TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AsyncCompletedEventHandler(object sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AsyncCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AsyncCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AsyncCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void AsyncCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示將處理非同步作業之 *MethodName* 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the *MethodName* event of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式方法。The event-handler method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). 是非同步的方法，請呼叫*MethodName*，在您的元件，您可以對應*MethodName* `Completed`事件，以及選用性*MethodName*`CompletedEventArgs`類別。For an asynchronous method, called *MethodName*, in your component, you will have a corresponding *MethodName*`Completed` event, and an optional *MethodName*`CompletedEventArgs` class. 支援多個並行引動過程的非同步方法的元件，用戶端可以提供唯一的語彙基元，或工作識別碼，以區分的非同步工作引發特定事件。For a component that supports multiple concurrent invocations of its asynchronous methods, the client can supply a unique token, or task ID, to distinguish which asynchronous task is raising particular events. 用戶端可以讀取屬性來判斷哪一項工作回報已完成。The client's can read the property to determine which task is reporting completion. 您的實作應該使用建立將用戶端的工作識別碼具有暫止的非同步工作產生關聯。Your implementation should use the to create an that associates the client's task IDs with pending asynchronous tasks. ## Examples 程式碼範例的委派，請參閱中的範例類別。For a code example of the delegate, see the example in the class.
